verbose_text: After 24h, vesicle transport inhibitors brefeldin A (BioLegend) and Golgi Stop (BD Biosciences) were added the culture media following the manufacturer 's instructions and cells were cultured for 5 additional h. Subsequently, cells were washed with 1x PBS and intracellular expression of IL-12 and IL-6 in CD14 - CD11c Hi HLADR + mDCs and CD14 + Monocytes was evaluated by flow cytometry.
